review_blob: Dont know if it was just me but after a few pints it really hit me, very strong tasting cider. Cloudy and msyterious to the eye but smooth and tasty to the throught.
really strong tasting cider where after a few pints youll be wondering if you can stand up properly. Not as sweet as most ciders out there and probably harder to find.
Clear and sparkling cider thats too sweet for me but had a nice bite too it. Other than that its a very plain and boring cider, nothing as good as Addlestones
One of the most popular ciders in pubs and tastes smooth, not too sweet. Makes your burps smell funny tho

beer_brewer_name: Magners GB / Shepton Mallet Cider Mill (C&C; Group)
review_blob: My favourite cider, doesnt taste too sweet like most ciders and goes down really nicely. The cloudyness gives it a mysterious appearence and smells very much of apples. Drank it in a village in weardale and cant find it anywhere else tho.
